name: Glitch Sweeper
description:
FIX THE GLITCH BEFORE IT GLITCHES YOU. MADE FOR WOWIEJAM2.0  THEME: INTENTIONAL BUGS  WHEN YOU HIT A "BUG" IT CAN GLITCH TO A DIFFERENT POSITION AND GLITCH THE BOARD IN THE PROCESS. YOU LOSE A LIFE IF:
  1. YOU HIT A GLITCH WITHOUT A SPANNER.
  2. YOU HIT A NORMAL TILE WITH A SPANNER.
ALL FEEDBACK GREATLY APPRECIATED, WEBOW ALL SOUNDS SOURCED FROM FREESOUND.ORG FROM THESE ARTISTS, UNDER CREATIVE COMMONS, WITH THANKS:

KICKHAT, SYSEQ, DOCTOR_DREAMCHIP, HUNTER4708, IANSTARGEM, NOIRENEX
